name: Foo Heppy
description:
This game was created in one week for Brackeys Jam 2022.2. Please excuse the janky artwork, I over-scoped as per usual.

You've come to an alien planet to facilitate an emergency evacuation. Someone there needs your help, but you'll have to learn her language in order to bring her to safety.

Controls
WASD - movement
E - interact

How To Play
The radio menu (accessed with the '...' button) allows you to send and receive messages with the alien. You click each word to form your message and hit "Send", and the alien will respond. 

Each new word you learn gets added to a list. You can use that list to guess at the word's correct translation.

Good luck and have fun!

Attributions
Freesound.org - Button Click Sound
